message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $6,000, you get $4,000.  It's in both our interests to settle quickly.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than your initial offer.  Let's split it 5500/4500. We're both losing money with each round, so it's in our best interest to reach an agreement quickly.
Bob, let's be realistic. I took a hit on that last round because of inflation.  I'll take the $5,500, you take $4,500.  It's time to settle.
